info.name: Products API Collection
info.description: A web api that stores product records

request.description: This endpoint makes a HTTP GET request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products](http://localhost:6969/api/products) and retreives the list of products

response.name: New Request
response.body:
{
    "message": "Products retrieved successfully",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Wireless Headphones",
            "category": "Electronics",
            "price": 99.99,
            "description": "High-quality sound with noise cancellation.",
            "features": [
                "Bluetooth 5.0",
                "20-hour battery life",

request.description: This endpoint makes a HTTP GET request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id](http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id) and retreives a product by the id specified

response.name: New Request

request.description:
This endpoint makes a HTTP GET request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products/category/:category](http://localhost:6969/api/products/category/:category)

and retreives all products that are within the specified category

response.name: New Request
response.body:

request.description: This endpoint makes a HTTP POST request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products](http://localhost:6969/api/products) and adds a product to the list

response.name: New Request

body.raw:
{
    "id": 16,
    "name": "Acer 1440p 34-inch 180hz Gaming Monitor",
    "price": 320,
    "category": "Electronics",
    "description": "An amazing multi-tasking and gaming device",
    "features": ["1440p", "180hz"],
    "image": "http://fakeacerwebsite.com/acer34inch.jpg"
}

request.description: This endpoint makes a HTTP PUT request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id](http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id) and updates a product given an id and product changes

response.name: New Request

body.raw:
{
    "id": 15,
    "name": "Electric Scooter (SALE)",
    "category": "Outdoor & Sports",
    "price": 449.99,
    "description": "Foldable electric scooter with long-range battery.",
    "features": ["25 mph top speed", "LED display", "Dual brakes"],
    "image": "/images/scooter.jpg"
}

request.description: This endpoint makes a HTTP DELETE request to [http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id](http://localhost:6969/api/products/:id) and removes a product based off of the given id

response.name: Delete product
